title: Meditation: Mind Like a Vast Sky (2018-04-18)
itunes:title: Meditation: Mind Like a Vast Sky
description:
Meditation: Mind Like a Vast Sky (2018-04-18) - This meditation opens with listening and discovering the sky-like awareness that includes changing sounds, thoughts, feelings and sensations. The sounding of bells and chimes assists in connecting to and resting in the boundless and loving awareness that is our true home.

Free download of Tara's 10 min meditation:
"Mindful Breathing: Finding Calm and Ease"
when you join her email list.
